properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 18 at 8:55PM CST until January 21 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in
Illinois...

Big Muddy River near Plumfield affecting Franklin and Williamson
Counties

...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in
Illinois...
Big Muddy River near Murphysboro affecting Jackson County

.The Big Muddy River will remain near flood stage at Plumfield
this evening, then crest near 20.3 feet early Monday morning.
At Murphysboro, the river will continue a slow fall.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Big Muddy River near Plumfield.
* until Tuesday morning.
* At  8:30 PM Saturday the stage was 19.8 feet.
* Flood Stage is 20.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by tomorrow late morning and
continue to rise to near 20.3 feet by early Monday morning. The
river will fall below flood stage by Tuesday morning.
* Impact...At 20.0 Feet...Minor flooding occurs affecting mainly
bottomland and surrounding low lying areas.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
